examples.text: We continue to balance growth with underwriting quality, resulting in faster top‑line expansion and improving loss ratios. Our AI models are yielding better risk selection while keeping costs low.

During the quarter we delivered strong revenue growth and achieved positive free cash flow. Our focus remains on delighting customers while driving disciplined expansion across products and geographies.

Customer growth accelerated in every region, with particularly strong adoption of our car and pet insurance products. We also saw record Giveback contributions, highlighting the power of our community model.

We’ve made meaningful progress on our path to profitability, with gross margins expanding and operating expenses growing more slowly than premiums. The reinsurance reset continues to reduce volatility in our results.

Our product portfolio is now fully AI‑native, enabling instant quotes and claim decisions at scale. This technological edge is becoming increasingly evident in our unit economics and customer retention.
We remain committed to social impact, allocating unused premiums to nonprofits chosen by our policyholders. This quarter’s Giveback supported dozens of organizations across the U.S. and Europe.

examples.text: Lemonade offers renters, homeowners, car, pet and life insurance powered by AI and social impact. Its full stack carriers replace brokers and bureaucracy with bots and machine learning, aiming for zero paperwork and instant everything. A Certified B‑Corp, Lemonade donates unused premiums to nonprofits selected by its community.

As a public benefit corporation, Lemonade’s mission is to make insurance simple, affordable and socially impactful. The company operates in the U.S. and Europe and continues to expand globally while maintaining a focus on sustainability and community.

Lemonade uses automation and behavioral economics to delight customers and reduce costs. The company’s Giveback program embodies its commitment to fairness by donating leftover premiums to causes that policyholders care about.

By building an AI‑native insurer from the ground up, Lemonade eliminates paperwork and long waits. The app enables customers to purchase policies and file claims in minutes, with rapid claim decisions for most incidents.

Lemonade is traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker LMND and is regulated by insurance authorities in the countries where it operates. Its financial strength is supported by relationships with some of the world’s largest reinsurers.
